original_text: We have thought carefully about these things. We know that they are true. So listen to what we say. Accept it and it will be good for you.’ We have thought carefully about these things.
korean_text: 볼지어다 우리가 연구한 바가 이와 같으니 너는 들어 보라 그러면 네가 알리라

sentences.original_text: We have thought carefully about these things.
We know that they are true.
So listen to what we say.
Accept it and it will be good for you.
